mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX( CUST_ID ) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX( CUST_ID ) + 1 END AS "newId" FROM TB_CUSTOMER

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.repository.CustomerRepository */ SELECT * FROM TB_CUSTOMER WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CUST_USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{custUsrNm}, '%')
AND CUST_CELL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{custCellNo}, '%')
ORDER BY CUST_USR_NM

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.CustomerRepository.findCustomerByCustId */ SELECT CUST_ID , CUST_USR_NM , CUST_CELL_NO , CUST_BIRTH_DT , CUST_GEN_TP_CD , MRG_YN , PCRT_CHD_CNT , LST_PCRT_YEAR , BRST_FDG_YN , VIST_TP_CD , ZIP_CODE , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , DEL_YN , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO , UPD_DT , UPD_USR_NO , CUST_MEMO , CUST_MEMO2 , RCMD_CUST_ID , RCMD_CUST_NM , RCMD_CELL_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CUSTOMER WHERE RCMD_CUST_ID = #{custId}) AS RCMD_CNT FROM TB_CUSTOMER WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.CustomerRepository.findCustomerByRsvtId */ SELECT CUST.CUST_ID , CUST.CUST_USR_NM , CUST.CUST_CELL_NO , CUST.CUST_BIRTH_DT , CUST.CUST_GEN_TP_CD , CUST.MRG_YN , CUST.PCRT_CHD_CNT , CUST.LST_PCRT_YEAR , CUST.BRST_FDG_YN , CUST.VIST_TP_CD , CUST.ZIP_CODE , CUST.ADDR1 , CUST.ADDR2 , CUST_DEL_YN , CUST.REG_DT , CUST.REG_USR_NO , CUST.UPD_DT , CUST.UPD_USR_NO , CUST.CUST_MEMO , CUST.CUST_MEMO2 , CUST.RCMD_CUST_ID , CUST.RCMD_CUST_NM , CUST.RCMD_CELL_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CUSTOMER WHERE RCMD_CUST_ID = CUST.CUST_ID) AS RCMD_CNT FROM TB_CUSTOMER CUST LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PP_RSVT_SCH RSVT ON CUST.CUST_ID = RSVT.CUST_ID WHERE RSVT_ID = #{rsvtId}
